remarks: The left inverse element of a group is unique.  Lemma 2.2.1(b) of [Herstein] p. 55.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Oct-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
grpinveu.1 $e |- X = ran G $.
grpinveu.2 $e |- U = ( GId ` G ) $.
grpoinveu $p |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> E! y e. X ( y G A ) = U ) $.
$d A y $.
$d G y $.
$d U y $.
$d X y $.
